fields.label: Thumbnail Image Alignment
fields.name: thumbnail_image_alignment
fields.instructions: In case the featured image is cropped oddly in the thumbnail image on the home page or category pages, select the vertical alignment here.

fields.message: Please use images that are at least 800 pixels wide.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Suggested size: 1200 pixels wide and 500 pixels tall. If smaller, image will be stretched to fit (though this may result in some blurriness).

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.message: Title, image and link will be pulled from the blog post. The description will be the blog post's excerpt field.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: s1_image
sub_fields.instructions: Suggested size: 500 pixels wide by 300 pixels tall. If smaller, image will be stretched to fit (though this may result in some blurriness).

sub_fields.message: Image, categories, title and link will be pulled from the blog post.

choices.left: Image to the left of the bio

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions:
For best results, use a square image that is at least 160x160 pixels. Wordpress will do its best to resize and position properly if an ideal image isn't used.

If using the two column layout with the image above the bio, make sure to upload an image that is at least 384x384 pixels.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: For best results, use a square image that is at least 230x230 pixels. Wordpress will do its best to resize and position properly if an ideal image isn't used.
